Excelente juego con una jugabilidad unica y original, eso si hay que estar claro que es casi un minijuego pero muy perfeccionado, el juego solo tiene 2 modalidades sobreviviente y asesino, un set de 4 habilidades que puedes cambiar entre una gran variedad de combinaciones y los asesinos tienen una habilidad carateristica, reparar 5 motores abrir una puerta y escapar o matar a los sobrevivientes, un juego simple pero enviciante perfecto para jugar con amigos o solo, ademas que mientras mas te adentras descubres que no es tan simple como parece, varios mundos tematicos y personajes iconicos del cine de terror, posiblemente el mejor juego en su tipo, partidas cortas pero entretenidas.
Esta guapardo el juego, mejor si no te toca la Legion
Now my only issue, other then the game itself heh, is getting 90% of my achievements back

I wouldn't recommend this game if you get upset easily. Fanbase is full of toxic players, devs refuse to address any major issues with the game and instead completely change things that don't need to be changed. They reward players for bad/toxic behavior and the played base is slowly dying.

The community likes to tear each other apart blaming the other party (killer/survivor). I've played both and can easily say each is extremely toxic. No matter how fair you play people are going to find a way to sh!t on you. Killers will facecamp, tunnel, and occasionally target certain people/survivors for petty/malicious reasons. Survivors will sabotage their teammates and be extremely toxic towards killers/other survivors.

Here are a few incidents I've had with people:
SFW (organized group of friends) who will hold the game hostage and their only purpose is to bully the killer and try to make them rage quit/bully them
Trolls will sometimes target TTV's (streamers) to try and get a "reaction" out of them or ruin their game
Survivors will sandbag/sabotage their teammates and often teabag/bm killers to try and make them rage quit/DC because they think it's funny

One of the worst parts is end game chat, people will often insult or ridicule each other after a match. If you're on the same platform as someone else they will sometimes send you hateful messages through the platform itself. As a TTV (Twitch Streamer) I've even had people come into my stream and insult me and my viewers.

This next one only really applies to TTV's but I've had a few incidents of stream sniping or being targeted in game because I had TTV in my name. Yes I've actually come a cross a few killers named things like "Twitch Camper" or "TTV Tunneler" who only targeted me and tried to get a reaction out of me on stream.

Lastly is the bugs/hackers. A while ago their was a HUGE hacking issue on both ends. Killers would hack to get guaranteed kills and survivors would hack to get guaranteed escapes or hold a game hostage to troll/bully a killer. Also there have been people who will use minor/small unnoticeable hacks (I've caught people on stream using them) and if you catch them they will accuse you of being petty and imagining things.

The hacker issue seems to have been fixed as of lately but since then there have been a rise in bugs. It seems they create 5 bugs for every 1 they fix. And sometimes if people find a bug they will exploit it for their own benefit and often post it on social media so that others can also abuse it.

Overall it is a good game and I do enjoy playing it (sometimes) but they need to start listening to their community. The game has been slowly losing players and it seems all that's left is toxic players with devs who make new cosmetics every 10 seconds instead of balancing and making their game more enjoyable again.

Game is fun as long as you get a decent non-toxic group... this is difficult as they have a poor match making system.  Those who are novice and do not play for hours on end cannot stand up to those who do.   Also, some of the killers are nie impossible to escape... see the previous statement about matchmaking... It is best to survive with friends or just play in closed games with five people you know...

i have no friend to play with so i enjoy playing as killer in this game <3

Super fun game to play with friends and by yourself, the main sucky parts are BM players and my newest personal issue is being disconnected from the game and being punished because the server queue decided making me play instantly was better than making sure I'm playing with people from the SAME REGION. Obviously no game is perfect, but there could be improvements made in pretty quick steps. ALL of my disconnects always happen between the last generator being done and opening the exit doors, almost like the server has decided the game has gone on too long without giving me the timer to act on.
Muy entretenido y más cuando juegas con amigos.

Survivor based game with perk reliant killers if you aren't using the top 5 killers. There is such a huge difference and divide between good and bad perks in this game, which just encourages players to perform and play in the most scummy way possible. BHVR seems to have a horrible time in balancing anything because they ONLY listen to survivors opinions. Why do maps like cowshed and mothers dwelling exist? Why do they balancing every perk around the top 3 killers? Why do all the killer mains leave the game? It's because they ONLY listen to survivors opinions. Most maps are ridiculously survivor friendly and when you finally outplay a survivor, they will just use DH. Oh? The game is going south so the killer makes a strategic decision to kill someone quickly? BT into DH into DS into pallet stun. Don't wanna eat the DS? Oh, don't worry. Just slug them and they will use UNB. 

Anytime the killer wins, it's just a hurl of insults towards the killer, from slurs to death threats. Survivors always cry about how they didn't have a fun time if/when they lose, while saying some of the most obscene and stupid things through a very poorly made censorship system. They will never consider a killers fun and feelings, so why should a killer consider survivors fun? Survivors will 4 man stack SWF, while all bring BNP (Nothing wrong with this play style) and get annoyed when the killer rushes their objective to kill them? It's constant irony. Honestly, maybe if the toxicity wasn't so high the game would be much more TOLERABLE. Not fun. TOLERABLE. 

Due to the fact, that killers are leaving, the survivor solo queues are overwhelmingly long. Once you've finally entered a match, to then be immediately tunnelled, camped and killed, it ruins the entire experience and leaves a bad taste in your mouth. There's nothing wrong with this play style, but when the games are shorter than the queues, survivors never get a chance to learn/play and as a result become toxic and short tempered. I can't imagine the experience of a poor 40 year old father that comes home and finally has 40 minutes to spare, and decides to boot up DBD to be welcomed with 20 minute queue times, 5 minute matches, same 3 killers, and stagnant meta builds on everyone.

Repetetivní, furt jen opravujete motory nebo ošetřujete, sundáte z háku parťáka a nakonec otevřít vrata k úniku. Je tam do toho minihra odkliknutí v pravou chvíli tlačítkem. Spousta výzev a sbírání bodů za aktivitu ve hře pro levlování postavy, bonusy do hry atd. Hra se vám zaryje pod kůži. Když nemáte s kým hrát tak hrajete za zabijáka nebo vám hra náhodně někoho dohodí a i přesto je to zábava. Za akční cenu neztratíte.
